text: Guess I m just looking for someone to talk me out of it Figured I would give this one shot seeing as I can t try it after   Here s the first and last paragraphs from my suicide note  i cut out the middle since it contains shit i only want some folks to see   If you are reading this  then what s done has been done and cannot be undone   I ve been living in a continued state of decay for what seems an immeasurable amount of time   That seems almost inaccurate as it seems there has to have once been something of worth for it to decompose   A flower decomposes because it changes from something that was once beautiful into something that no longer has any beauty   A rock does not decay   A more fitting way to put it is I ve been weathering away as a stone does under millions of years of erosion   I cannot remember a time that I felt I had worth and cannot foresee a time in the future of this being proven wrong    To bring this to a conclusion I feel the end is drawing near for me I can t stand living another second   I am nothing   I lay down in bed motionless for hours unable to catch sleep begging for the room to explode     I wake up in the morning begging for the roof to cave in   When I shave I think  this razor would be sharp enough to do it   and when I walk to class I beg for a freight train to crash out of nowhere and mow me down   I want to scream  I wish I could be helped but my pride would not permit it   I have hate for nothing and no one in this world  other than myself   I want it all to end  the only thing that stopped me before was the fear of disappointing the people I leave behind   But I ve reached a point where I can no longer see into myself  I see only murk   I wish someone could pull me out of this tomb of self loathing and ugliness I m trapped in but this won t happen so I think it s about time to kill the one man I ve ever hated  myself
summary: Suicide note is a suicide note written by a man who feels he's been living in a state of decay for a long time. He wants to kill himself as he can't stand living another second. He wishes he could talk someone out of it.
cleaned: suicide note suicide note write man feel live state decay long time want kill not stand live second wish talk

text: Suicide  Intrusive Thoughts and ImpulsivityLately  I have been having more vivid intrusive thoughts about suicide   How fast should I drive before hitting this tree so it could potentially kill me   How tall is this building where it could end me  However  I do not actually feel depressed or sad  Yet  when I think about suicide  it seems like an easy process and I could be completely okay with not existing   I have a decent life  decent job  and college soon to come to an end  I m financially okay and all around a decent person  But these thoughts are so numerous that I feel as though it has become normal for me  When I was younger  around freshman in high school  I got angry and impulsively popped about   pills  Of course it was a learning experience for me but my intention at the moment was not to kill myself but act out from being angry  I am not an angry person and I rarely get angry  When I do get angry  I become impulsive   I m afraid that one day  when I do get angry that I will eventually hurt myself or end myself because of how vivid these intrusive thoughts are  It s strange though  because I do not get angry often and usually takes a lot to get me upset  Sometimes I m able to control the anger but I feel as though that impulsive behavior that rarely occurs will put me in the grave
summary: Lately I have been having more intrusive thoughts about suicide. When I was a freshman in high school I got angry and impulsively popped about pills. I am not an angry person and I rarely get angry. I'm afraid that one day when I do get angry I will hurt myself or end myself.

text: Is water wet  Lets solve it  So  what is wet  Wet is when something regardless of texture or shape comes into contact with a liquid  which is water in this case So what is water  It is a compund of different types of atoms  It is matter  It has structure If you think with the logic from line    TECHNICALLY  the H O molecule in the center of a raindrop is wet because it is covered with more molecules  which is covered by more  etc  Kind of like an onion So heres my conclusion A single molecule of H O is not wet  but a group of H O molecules are
